name: Texas Instruments TMDS62LEVM
description: The Texas Instruments TMDS62LEVM evaluation module (EVM) is a stand-alone test and development platform built around the AM62L system-on-a-chip (SoC). AM62L processor is comprised of a dual-core 64-bit Arm®-Cortex®-A53 microprocessor. It features an HDMI port for up to 2K 60fps displays and two ethernet ports. It has no GPU yet is fast with LVGL software rendering.
shortDescription: Powerful Texas Instruments Cortex®-A53 based device for embedded Linux.
getStartedInstructions:
1. Open the project folder and update the submodules: `git submodule update --init --recursive` 
2. Follow the guide in the [README](https://github.com/lvgl/lv_port_linux/tree/master/boards/texas-instruments_sk-am62l/README.md#getting-started)
